statements: SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations;
SELECT id, network_name FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT network_name, gateway_address FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE dns_server = '8.8.8.8';
SELECT subnet_mask, ip_address, gateway_address FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE network_name = 'Internal';
SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE ip_address='192.168.1.10';
SELECT network_name, subnet_mask FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE id=5;
SELECT DISTINCT network_name FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE dns_server='8.8.8.8';
SELECT id, network_name, ip_address FROM NetworkConfigurations WHERE gateway_address LIKE '192.168%';
SELECT * FROM NetworkConfigurations ORDER BY network_name DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_settings;
SELECT id, interface_name, ip_address FROM network_settings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT switch_name, interface_id, port_number FROM switch_mapping WHERE switch_name = 'Switch1';
SELECT interface_name, ip_address, gateway FROM network_settings ORDER BY interface_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM switch_mapping WHERE port_number > 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_settings WHERE id = 1;
SELECT interface_name, ip_address, gateway FROM network_settings WHERE subnet_mask = '255.255.255.0';
SELECT switch_name, port_number FROM switch_mapping WHERE interface_id = 5 ORDER BY port_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM network_settings WHERE gateway = '192.168.1.1' OR gateway = '10.0.0.1';
SELECT id, interface_name, ip_address FROM network_settings WHERE interface_name LIKE '%eth%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, status FROM NetworkDevices WHERE status = true;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, port FROM NetworkDevices WHERE port > 8000;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, log_time FROM NetworkDevices JOIN NetworkLogs ON NetworkDevices.device_id = NetworkLogs.device_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address, port, status FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT * FROM NetworkSettings WHERE setting_name = 'DNS';
SELECT log_id, log_time, log_message FROM NetworkLogs WHERE device_id = 1 ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM NetworkSettings WHERE description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_id, mac_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT setting_name, setting_value FROM NetworkSettings WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM NetworkLogs ORDER BY log_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM NetworkSettings WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT log_message, log_time FROM NetworkLogs WHERE device_id = 3 ORDER BY log_time ASC;
SELECT vlan_id, vlan_name, subnet FROM VLANConfiguration;
SELECT * FROM network_config
SELECT name, ip_address, gateway FROM network_config
SELECT * FROM device WHERE device_type = 'router'
SELECT device_name, device_type, vlan_id FROM device INNER JOIN port_config ON device.id = port_config.device_id
SELECT timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, vlan_id, port_number FROM traffic_log ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM network_config WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, ip_address, subnet_mask FROM network_config WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT vlan_name, vlan_id FROM network_vlan WHERE vlan_id > 100 ORDER BY vlan_id ASC;
SELECT timestamp, source_ip, destination_ip, port_number FROM traffic_log WHERE destination_ip LIKE '192.168.%';
